channel.title: Website Hosting - Cheap and Reliable-
channel.description:
[b][i][u]THIS IS NOT ADVERTISING!! THIS IS RECOMMENDING NEW COMERS TO WEB HOSTING![/u][/i][/b]
[CENTER][IMG]http://thatonehost.net/main/images/thatonehost.png[/img] [CENTER][/CENTER][IMG]http://thatonehost.net/main/images/buttonsfooter.png[/img][/CENTER]
[URL=http://"http://thatonehost.net"]Thatonehost.net home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://thatonehost.net/clients/clientarea.php"]Thatonehost.net Client Area[/URL] [URL=http://"http://thatonehost.net/clients/order.php"]Order Now![/URL]
Hello welcome to the web host that suites your needs, i do no own the host and i was not requested to post this. I believe that any customer of a web host should take responsibility and show off the host that they use.
I personally bought the best plan here for a good reason, because its cheap and reliable. The host is never down, and the workers also provide assistance whether its required or not by the owner. I believe this web host is rather new to the web hosting environment but it also will be there for a LONG time. As a customer i do post this and ask you to take a look at the web host to see if you like it or not.
[COLOR="Red"]Here are some details on the web host:[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/35ch1y9.jpg[/img]
[COLOR="Red"]These are all features that come with every single plan above.[/COLOR]
[ul][*]Domain Registration for 15.00/ year OPTIONAL [*]The latest Cpanel upgrades and improvements [*]Fantastico [*]phpMyAdmin [*]File Manager [*]Database Wizard [*]Backup Wizard [*]Daily Database Backups[/ul]
Since this is a rather new company for hosting, web hosting is the only hosting provided. Once the company gains more trust and becomes bigger then it will move into a VPS and Dedication hosting along with the web hosting.
I suggest using this not because i said so, but because its cheap and reliable. You can get any package above easily from money made online whether its from borrowing it from a friend or from even surveys. Its only 1.25$ a month for the cheapest host, but yes you must follow the guide lines that are above such as you cant go over 2 gigs of bandwidth... ect...
Any questions? Post here im sure they will be answered.
